com.twcable.grabbit.tools.monitor

Interface JobStatusCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleFileJobStatusCache, SimpleMapJobStatusCache

    public interface JobStatusCache

    A cache of the job status from the last time "start" was invoked. While monitoring the jobs, the status of the jobs are likely the change.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<HostJobState> entries() 
      @Nullable HostJobState put(HostJobState entry)
      Puts the given entry in the cache, returning the value it’s replacing.
      default @Nullable HostJobState put(java.net.URI location, long jobId, JobState state)
      Puts the given entry in the cache, returning the value it’s replacing.
